articles.description: Laying down the law in Thursday's episode of the ITV2 dating series, Millie allows Liam back into her bed, but under heavy conditions as she inches closer to forgiving him after Casa Amor.
articles.content:
They've found themselves at the centre of Love Island's latest drama, thanks to Liam Reardon's betrayal at Casa Amor. 
He's been pulling out all the stops to win back Millie Court and after choosing… [+5197 chars]
